an2.250-254:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two qualities that have suffering as their outcome. What two? (250) Anger and hostility … (25) Denigration and insolence … (252) Envy and miserliness … (253) Deceitfulness and craftiness … (254) Moral shamelessness and moral recklessness. These are the two qualities that have suffering as their outcome."
